__e: Do you think we can get him to come and see her?
I was going to come and find you once I could bring myself to do it.
I really appreciate you taking the time out of what I assume is a busy day to come here and talk to me about...
Very kind of you to come all this way to see that I was all right.
Yes, in fact, it would come here possible to save them.
But you mean you didn't come all the way out here to say hi?
